jcr:content.jcr:description: The Altra Rivera is the ultimate road runner, designed to fit like a glove and run like the wind. Check out this neutral road shoe by Altra and move naturally!
jcr:content.pageTitle: Mid-Cushion Road Trainer with Slim Fit - Rivera | Altra Running

video.description: Woman running around town in the Altra Rivera
video.name: Altra Running Rivera

customhtml2_11446045.customHTML:
THE ALL-NEW RIVERA:
FITS LIKE A GLOVE,
RUNS LIKE THE WIND

customhtml2.customHTML:
The all-new Rivera has all the Altra features you love, like FootShape™ comfort and Altra EGO™ midsole foam. Plus, it comes in a sleek design and tailored fit that’s easy on the eyes (and the feet).

A PERFECT FIT

One of the most exciting features of the Rivera is its tailored fit. It has the Altra comfort you expect, packaged in a sleeker design. But don’t be fooled by its good looks: this versatile shoe is built to take on any road.

image.alt: Man running in a park in the Altra Rivera

customhtml2.customHTML:
BIG EGO ENERGY

The Rivera is outfitted with our Altra EGO™ midsole foam to give you the responsiveness you expect and an overall soft ride your feet will love.

customhtml2_copy.customHTML:
NEUTRAL INNERFLEX™ +
FOOTPOD™ TECHNOLOGY

The Rivera has innovative technologies designed to mimic your body’s natural form and movements. From the flexible Neutral InnerFlex™ midsole, to the body-loving Footpod™ and the Bio Heel technology, this road runner is a natural fit.

image.alt: Women's Rivera Neutral InnerFlex Sole Shot
Man running on paved path in Altra Rivera shoe

customhtml2_copy.customHTML:
ALTRA FOOTSHAPE™ COMFORT

Our signature FootShape™ comfort gives your feet more space to sit naturally and is designed to address biological differences in men's and women's feet.

image.alt: Women's Rivera Teal Green Top Shot
